A company, according to Modigliani and Miller, has to weigh their tax considerations against their bankruptcy costs and get an ______ debt-equity ratio out of that.
result.chn: 根据MM理论,一家公司,必须在租税考量与破产成本之间进行权衡,然后得出最有利的负债权益比(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Blood clots can kill if they move to the heart and lungs and stop needed ______ from reaching those important organs.
The ______ has to get from one place to another very rapidly and this is the fastest way to do it.
result.chn: 器官必须以最快的速度送到,用飞机送是最快的方法(生物医学工程探索课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: "So,BP's ______ growth in recent years has been halted, slightly reversed, but the important thing is it has survived so far;
Place the non-bonding pairs on ______ atoms first, which the higher average valence electron energy.
result.chn: 首先将孤对电子放在外围的原子，那儿具有较高的平均价电子能。(固态化学导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: Some are very tall. Yet all are below the level of an ______ on the edge, looking over.
That follows then that this intuition suggests that what I find intuitively ______ is the personality theory of personal identity.
result.chn: 也就是说这个直觉暗示的是,我认为人格理论在直觉上是合理的。(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: And at the same time, accepting the ______ emotions are as much part of human nature as the wonderful emotions.
result.chn: 与此同时，也认同痛苦的情绪,和美好的情绪一样都是人性的组成。(幸福课课程节选 : 哈佛公开课)

result.problem: The State Department report, released Thursday, contains an ______ of the expanding security ties between the United States and Kenya, aimed at preventing terrorists from staging attacks inside Kenya and apprehending suspected terrorists.
And there's increasing research that shows a direct but poorly-understood link between relationships and ______ processes in the body.
Nineteen of the countries at least ______ controlled international connections to the Internet.
Now, ______ understanding illustrates all sorts of aspects of language processing and, in fact, of consciousness.
result.chn: 语音理解实际上说明了,语言加工和意识的各个方面(心理学导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Charlie Nardozzi says parsley likes to grow in sunny places or in ______ sun.
It turns out that this quantity here, which is called eta of J the Joule free expansion ______, is not quite zero.
result.chn: 这个量后来被，称作焦耳膨胀系数,其实并不等于零。(热力学与动力学课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)
